headline: Citi Maintains Neutral Outlook on Simon Property Group (SPG)
summary: Simon Property Group, Inc. (NYSE:SPG) is one of the best dividend stocks in the real estate sector. On November 26, Citi maintained a Neutral rating on Simon Property Group while lifting the price target from $170 to $185. In another corporate update, dated November 18, Simon Property Group announced the acquisition of Phillips Place in […]
